definition: to cover/to encase/cover/sheath/to overlap/to interleave/to model after/to copy/formula/harness/loop of rope/(fig.) to fish for/to obtain slyly/classifier for sets, collections/bend (of a river or mountain range, in place names)/tau (Greek letter Ττ)

sentences.english: We would expect carry trades with larger interest rate differentials to perform even better.
sentences.chinese: 我们预计套利交易利率差越大的表现将更好。

sentences.english: Can mispricings or bubbles persist in the presence of rational arbitrageurs?
sentences.chinese: 理性套利者的存在能够制止价格误定或泡沫么？

sentences.english: No arbitrage can correct the mispricing.
sentences.chinese: 任何套利都无法修正错误定价。

sentences.english: Many private businesses have been arbitraging this opportunity.
sentences.chinese: 不少民营企业都在利用这个机会套利。

sentences.english: The arbitrageur was accused of manipulating stock prices.
sentences.chinese: 该股票套利者被指控操纵股票价格。

sentences.english: If the takeover fails the arbitrageur may lose a great deal of money.
sentences.chinese: 如果套汇失败套利者可能会损失大量的钱。

sentences.english: A second puzzle is why the effect has not been arbitraged away.
sentences.chinese: 第二个谜团是为什么该效应没有因为套利而消失。

sentences.english: Icahn bought positions in both companies as an arbitrage play.
sentences.chinese: 爱康在两家公司之间进行套利。

sentences.english: Carry was a bubble that grew with all the other bubbles.
sentences.chinese: 套利交易是一种随其它泡沫共同增长的泡沫。

sentences.english: It is a scandal for Mr. J be a insider trading arbitrageur.
sentences.chinese: 先生从事内线交易套利是件可耻的事。

sentences.english: Strengthening funding currencies are the last thing a carry trader wants to see.
sentences.chinese: 借入货币不断走强是融资套利交易者最不愿看到的事。

sentences.english: At the same time arbitrage can surely smooth the price.
sentences.chinese: 但同时套利行为也无疑产生了重要的价格平抑作用。

sentences.english: It also shows that Shenzhen stock market almost conform to APT model.
sentences.chinese: 同时也表明深圳股市基本上符合套利定价模型。

sentences.english: In the USD area, it should be difficult for relative-value and arbitrage strategies to return more than the risk-free rate of 5%.
sentences.chinese: 在美元区，相对价值型和套利型策略难以获得高回报。

sentences.english: A while back, so-called carry trades were all the rage.
sentences.chinese: 一段时间以前，所谓的套利交易盛行一时。

sentences.english: This article focuses on pricing problem of Life Insurance Model under no-arbitrage framework .
sentences.chinese: 本文主要讨论无套利框架下的寿险模型定价问题。

definition: abbr. for 期貨合約|期货合约[qi1 huo4 he2 yue1], futures contract (finance)
financial leverage/leveraging (i.e. buying shares on borrowed funds)
to hedge (one's bets)/to defend against risk
to invest in stock/to buy shares
to make use of one's position to gain profit for oneself or one's associates
